casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Carnell L. CALHOUN 54P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 5, 2018 Mr. Carnell Calhoun, for Calhoun, Carnell Lavance Mr. Daniel P. O'Brien, Raleigh, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. Ms. N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of February 2018 by Defendant for Writ to Compel Production of Court File Records:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of April 2018."

Jackson and Ervin, J. recused
